languages.text: "Очистите "Бессердечного" от скверны, подлатайте и назначьте команду из числа верных подданных. Отныне он будет торговым судном в мирах династии фон Валанциус".
"Purge the Heartless of any corruption, patch it up, and assemble a loyal crew. Henceforth, it will serve as a trade vessel for the von Valancius worlds."
languages.original_text: "Очистите "Бессердечного" от скверны, подлатайте и назначьте команду из числа верных подданных. Отныне он будет торговым судном в мирах династии фон Валанциус".

"Purge the Heartless of any corruption, patch it up, and assemble a loyal crew. Henceforth, it will serve as a trade vessel for the von Valancius worlds."

languages.text: «Purgue toda la corrupción de la Desalmada, repare sus daños y prepare una tripulación leal. A partir de ahora, servirá como nave comercial en los mundos von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "Purge the Heartless of any corruption, patch it up, and assemble a loyal crew. Henceforth, it will serve as a trade vessel for the von Valancius worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Purgue toda la corrupción de la Desalmada, repare sus daños y prepare una tripulación leal. A partir de ahora, servirá como nave comercial en los mundos von Valancius».

languages.text: “铲除无心号的腐化，把它修理好，召集一群忠诚的船员。到时候，它就是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的商船了。”
languages.original_text: "Purge the Heartless of any corruption, patch it up, and assemble a loyal crew. Henceforth, it will serve as a trade vessel for the von Valancius worlds."

traits.locale_text: “铲除无心号的腐化，把它修理好，召集一群忠诚的船员。到时候，它就是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的商船了。”

languages.text: « Débarrassez le Sans-Cœur de toute trace de corruption, réparez-le et assemblez un équipage loyal. À compter de ce jour, il transportera de la marchandise entre les mondes des von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "Purge the Heartless of any corruption, patch it up, and assemble a loyal crew. Henceforth, it will serve as a trade vessel for the von Valancius worlds."

traits.locale_text: « Débarrassez le Sans-Cœur de toute trace de corruption, réparez-le et assemblez un équipage loyal. À compter de ce jour, il transportera de la marchandise entre les mondes des von Valancius. »

languages.text: 「ハートレスの忌まわしきものを一掃し、修復し、忠実な乗組員を集めろ。今後、それはフォン・ヴァランシウス世界の貿易船として使われる」
languages.original_text: "Purge the Heartless of any corruption, patch it up, and assemble a loyal crew. Henceforth, it will serve as a trade vessel for the von Valancius worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「ハートレスの忌まわしきものを一掃し、修復し、忠実な乗組員を集めろ。今後、それはフォン・ヴァランシウス世界の貿易船として使われる」

languages.text: "Taşkalp'i her türlü yozlaşmadan arındırın, onarın ve sadık bir mürettebat toplayın. Bundan böyle ticaret gemisi olarak von Valancius dünyalarına hizmet edecek."
languages.original_text: "Purge the Heartless of any corruption, patch it up, and assemble a loyal crew. Henceforth, it will serve as a trade vessel for the von Valancius worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Taşkalp'i her türlü yozlaşmadan arındırın, onarın ve sadık bir mürettebat toplayın. Bundan böyle ticaret gemisi olarak von Valancius dünyalarına hizmet edecek."

languages.text: "Befreit die Heartless von jeglicher Verderbnis, flickt sie zusammen und stellt eine loyale Crew zusammen. Ab sofort ist sie ein Handelsschiff derer von Valancius."
languages.original_text: "Purge the Heartless of any corruption, patch it up, and assemble a loyal crew. Henceforth, it will serve as a trade vessel for the von Valancius worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Befreit die Heartless von jeglicher Verderbnis, flickt sie zusammen und stellt eine loyale Crew zusammen. Ab sofort ist sie ein Handelsschiff derer von Valancius."
